title.text: GENERATION AS A SOLUTION TO ITS OWN PROBLEM

abstractContent.text: Natural language generation technology is now ripe for commercial exploitation, but one of the remaining bottlenecks is that of providing NLG •systems with user-friendly interfaces for Specifying the content of documents to be generated.

entities.text: Specifying the content of documents to be generated

abstractContent.text: We present here anew technique we have developed for providing such interfaces: WYSIWYM editing.
WYSIWYM (What You See Is What You Meant) makes novel use of the system's generator to provide a natural language input device which requires no NL interpretation.
